songs.title: Touch (Acoustic)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Perrie Edwards]
Just one touch, just one touch

[Verse 1: Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
Ahh, yeah, you and I and nobody else
Feeling feelings I never felt
Boy, it's the way you got me under your spell, ugh
Don't you keep it all to yourself

[Pre-Chorus: Perrie Edwards & All]
So won't you (Ahhh) take it
I feel like for the first time I am not faking (Oooh, ahh)
Fingers on my buttons and now you're (Ah, ah) playing
(Ah, ah) Master of anticipation, don't you keep it all to yourself

[Chorus: Jade Thirlwall, All & Perrie Edwards with Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
Just a touch (Ah) of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet all week
Just a touch (Ah) of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh (Ahhh)
Just a touch (Ahhh) of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body
Just a touch (Ah) of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet, all week
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh

[Verse 2: Jesy Nelson]
Photograph with no T-shirt on, hmm
Why you making me wait so long?
I promise to keep this a secret, I'll never tell, yeah-hey
But don't you keep it all to yourself, ooh

[Pre-Chorus: Jade Thirlwall & All]
So won't you (Ahhh) take it
I feel like for the first time I am not faking, yeah (Oooh, ahh)
Fingers on my buttons and now you're (Ah, ah) playing
(Ah, ah) Master of anticipation, don't you keep it all to yourself (To yourself)

[Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock, All & with Perrie Edwards]
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet all week (All week)
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh (Baby, one touch of your love, just a touch of your love)
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body (My body)
Just a touch of your love, oh (Your love)
Just a touch of your love, oooh (Your love)
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet all week
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body (Ohhh)
Just a touch of your love
Just a touch of your love, oh

[Interlude: Perrie Edwards & All, Perrie Edwards & Jesy Nelson, Leigh-Anne Pinnock with Perrie Edwards & (Perrie Edwards)]
Just one touch of your love
Just one touch of your love, a touch of your love
(I wanna feel your touch
I want it, I want it, I want it, so-o-o-o-o much)

[Outro: Jade Thirlwall]
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet all week
Just a touch of your love
Just a touch of your love
